hero.subtitle: Premium formulas crafted to protect, nourish, and extend the life of your extensions  because your hair deserves the finest rituals.

about.body1: Lunor is a premium beauty brand dedicated to elevating hair extension care and redefining modern hair rituals. Born from a passion for luxury, performance, and innovation  we were created to solve the real problems women face with hair extensions.
about.quote: "We don't just create products. We create rituals, confidence, and unforgettable hair experiences."
about.body2: From our signature Shine Bomb Ampoules to our innovative Extension Survival Kit, every Lunor product is crafted with high-performance formulas, premium ingredients, and luxurious aesthetics.

clipIn.title:
Clip-In
Extensions
clipIn.desc: The perfect solution for instant length and volume  no commitment needed. Easy to apply at home, removable in seconds, and completely damage-free.
clipIn.f4: Perfect for daily wear or special occasions

tapeIn.title:
Tape-In
Extensions
tapeIn.desc: A seamless, natural look that blends effortlessly with your hair. Lightweight adhesive wefts lie flat against the scalp for invisible coverage.

nano.title:
Nano
Extensions
nano.desc: The finest, most discreet extension technique available. Ultra-tiny nano rings are virtually invisible and protect your natural hair through the process.
nano.f2: No heat, glue or chemicals required

washBag.desc: Washing your extensions has never felt so luxurious. The Lunor Extension Wash Bag is designed to protect your hair during machine washing  preventing tangles, stretch, and damage while keeping every strand perfectly maintained.
washBag.f1: Fine-mesh premium netting protects every strand

serum.desc: Our most anticipated formula yet. The Lunor Extension Detangler Serum is a lightweight, high-performance treatment designed to eliminate knots, restore silk-smooth texture, and extend the lifespan of your extensions with every use.
serum.notifyLabel: Be the first to know when it launches:

values.nourishDesc: Deep conditioning formulas that restore life to every strand
values.extendLifeDesc: Engineered to dramatically increase the lifespan of your investment

contact.sub: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out for product inquiries, collaborations, or simply to discover which Lunor collection is right for you.
